mapper.select: SELECT code, email, user_id, password, nickname, name, birth, profile_image, introduction, revenue, point, role, state, is_certificated, is_subscriber_visible, create_date, update_date, delete_date, suspension_end_date FROM user WHERE nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%')

SELECT code, email, user_id, password, nickname, name, birth, profile_image, introduction, revenue, point, role, state, is_certificated, is_subscriber_visible, create_date, update_date, delete_date, suspension_end_date FROM user WHERE code = #{userCode}

SELECT code, email, user_id, password, nickname, name, birth, profile_image, introduction, revenue, point, role, state, is_certificated, is_subscriber_visible, create_date, update_date, delete_date, suspension_end_date FROM user WHERE state = 'ACTIVE' AND user_id = #{ userId }
SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE state = 'ACTIVE' AND user_id = #{ userId }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, password, name, nickname, email, birth) VALUES (#{ userId }, #{ password }, #{ name }, #{ nickname }, #{ email }, #{ birth })
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET state = 'WITHDRAWN' WHERE state = 'ACTIVE' AND user_id = #{userId}
